overview_of_class: Fundamentals of neuroanatomy, neurophysiology, and neuroscientific methods. Brain processes related to sensory processing, motor control, plasticity, and memory. Students will take a quiz and exams covering the content of the course, complete short writing assignments, and actively participate during lecture (using student response system technology).
